data.body: Add orchestration capabilities to Foolery: (1) Ship Now - embedded read-only terminal that spawns Claude CLI to execute bead work, (2) Wave Planner - algorithmic grouping of beads into parallel execution waves based on dependencies. Human QA gates represented as gate-type beads blocking wave progression.

data.title: Scene mckellen-gladiator: Foolery Orchestration: Ship Now + Wave Planner
